content:
Hey all -- so we ran out of scheduled design meetings. We have two pending meeting proposals, both opened by me:

  • lang team path to membership and MCP procedure rust-lang/lang-team#32
  • Discuss WF checks and type aliases rust-lang/lang-team#25

I'd like to propose that we schedule the first one for this coming Wednesday, unless folks think that is maybe too short notice, and we should start from next week? I'm amenable to that.
I'm not sure about rust-lang/lang-team#25, we've been putting off this conversation for ever, I think we should do it the week after I guess.
Thoughts @T-lang :point_up: about scheduling in the next few weeks?
Also, I updated rust-lang/lang-team#32 with a lot more details.
Any thoughts here from @T-lang folks? Should I schedule for next week -- hmm, actually, I might not be available next week :)
:+1: for both of these.
Ok so I won't be here next Wed most likely
so let's do this tomorrow and then we can do rust-lang/lang-team#25 in 3 weeks
